pages.text: $(li)The Ghast Tear is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/regeneration)Potion of Regeneration$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/end_crystal_ingot)End Crystal Ingot$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/end_crystal)End Crystal$(/l), or the $(l:patchouli:armors/ghost_armor)Ghost Armor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/ghast)Ghasts$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
